name: Ratergy
description: Ratergy is a local multiplayer arena action game. Fill your nest with cheese by using your two rats and put your skills and friendship to the test. Develop the most efficient cheese-gathering tactics by interacting with elements such as conveyor belts, bombs and many other power ups.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 M380 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Controller Required
